desc.en: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.jp: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.thai: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.ko: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.zh_tw: 在拉麵店散會後，老師一發現聯絡不上茜香，就以夏莱的權限查出茜香的手機發信位置奔赴營救。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上茜香，就以夏莱的权限查出茜香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上茜香，就以夏莱的权限查出茜香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上茜香，就以夏莱的权限查出茜香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。

desc.en: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika could be found. Shiroko thought it was the Helmet Gang who kidnapped her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proved that guess.
desc.jp: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika could be found. Shiroko thought it was the Helmet Gang who kidnapped her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proved that guess.
desc.thai: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika could be found. Shiroko thought it was the Helmet Gang who kidnapped her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proved that guess.
desc.ko: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika could be found. Shiroko thought it was the Helmet Gang who kidnapped her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proved that guess.
desc.zh_tw: 早過了打工的下班時間，卻哪都找不到芹香的蹤跡。白子立刻認為可能是頭盔團綁架了芹香，而之後回來的星野與老師證明了這一猜測。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到芹香的踪迹。白子立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了芹香，而之后回来的星野与老师证明了这一猜测。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到芹香的踪迹。白子立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了芹香，而之后回来的星野与老师证明了这一猜测。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到芹香的踪迹。白子立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了芹香，而之后回来的星野与老师证明了这一猜测。

desc.en: Serika, who found herself having been kidnapped, felt extremely uneasy, fearing that would make everyone abandon or mistake her. As she was sobbing in the back of the truck, the Foreclosure Committee made their way just in time, blowing up the truck to rescue her.
desc.jp: Serika, who found herself having been kidnapped, felt extremely uneasy, fearing that would make everyone abandon or mistake her. As she was sobbing in the back of the truck, the Foreclosure Committee made their way just in time, blowing up the truck to rescue her.
desc.thai: Serika, who found herself having been kidnapped, felt extremely uneasy, fearing that would make everyone abandon or mistake her. As she was sobbing in the back of the truck, the Foreclosure Committee made their way just in time, blowing up the truck to rescue her.
desc.ko: Serika, who found herself having been kidnapped, felt extremely uneasy, fearing that would make everyone abandon or mistake her. As she was sobbing in the back of the truck, the Foreclosure Committee made their way just in time, blowing up the truck to rescue her.
desc.zh_tw: 發現了自己被綁走的芹香深感不安，怕這樣就此被眾人拋棄或誤會。就在她在貨車後面悄悄啜泣時，對策委員會五人及時趕到，將卡車炸燬救出了芹香。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 发现了自己被绑走的芹香深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。就在她在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，对策委员会五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了芹香。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 发现了自己被绑走的芹香深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。就在她在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，对策委员会五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了芹香。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 发现了自己被绑走的芹香深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。就在她在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，对策委员会五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了芹香。

name.en: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.jp: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.thai: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.ko: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.zh_tw: 那天,我們與少女相遇了
name.zh_cn_jp: 那天,我们与少女相遇了
name.zh_cn_tw: 那天,我们与少女相遇了
name.zh_cn_cn: 那天,我们与少女相遇了

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.thai: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.ko: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在廢棄工廠遇到長得像人類的機器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井為了阻止遊戲開發部被廢社，於是便把愛麗絲帶到社團活動室，打算讓她成為社團成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.thai: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.ko: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_tw: 三人跑進了工廠裡，發現機器人不再跟隨。就在這時，設施裡的系統開始識別三人身份，並認出了老師，給三人發放了通行權限。三人從地板打開的門掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.thai: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.ko: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。
desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer.
desc.jp: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer.
desc.thai: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer.
desc.ko: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer.
desc.zh_tw: 三人相繼掉了下去，還好老師在底下做了些許緩衝。這時，桃井發現了什麼東西。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人相继掉了下去，还好老师在底下做了些许缓冲。这时，桃井发现了什么东西。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人相继掉了下去，还好老师在底下做了些许缓冲。这时，桃井发现了什么东西。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人相继掉了下去，还好老师在底下做了些许缓冲。这时，桃井发现了什么东西。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.thai: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.ko: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 三人在廢墟的一個天坑里發現了睡著著的愛麗絲，發現了“AL-1S”之類的字樣。綠可憐愛麗絲，便決定將她帶回千年，還給她穿上了自己的衣服。就在這時，愛麗絲因與老師接觸而醒了過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.jp: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.thai: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.ko: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井將愛麗絲帶回到社團活動室，綠非常驚詫。愛麗絲因為不懂，開始亂動社團的東西，比如把手柄和遊戲機塞進嘴里之類。桃井隨後說出了自己的計劃：她想讓愛麗絲偽裝成千年的學生加入社團，解決人數不夠被廢社的問題。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，首次于“游戏开发部”（主线第二章）的相关股市中
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.jp: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.thai: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.ko: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲開心地玩著遊戲開發部的前作<傳說年代記>。遊戲開發部全員看她玩得這麼開心都大受感動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.thai: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.ko: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠討論將愛麗絲偽裝成千年學生計劃的可行性。桃井負責去拿到假學生證，而綠和柚子負責教愛麗絲“說話”，希望將其高度機械化的語音模式修改過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，首次于“游戏开发部”（主线第二章）的相关股市中
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.jp: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.thai: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.ko: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井先行離開，綠為如何教愛麗絲說話而苦惱著。這時，愛麗絲則發現了一本曾經寫著他們做的遊戲的雜誌。綠於是決定讓愛麗絲玩玩自己的遊戲，試著用遊戲中的對話教會愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.
desc.jp: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.
desc.thai: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.
desc.ko: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲一邊開始遊戲，一邊聽桃井和綠的講解。儘管愛麗絲多次失敗且遇到了系統卡死問題，但她仍奮起直追，最終通關。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝一边开始游戏，一边听桃井和绿的讲解。尽管爱丽丝多次失败且遇到了系统卡死问题，但她仍奋起直追，最终通关。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝一边开始游戏，一边听桃井和绿的讲解。尽管爱丽丝多次失败且遇到了系统卡死问题，但她仍奋起直追，最终通关。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝一边开始游戏，一边听桃井和绿的讲解。尽管爱丽丝多次失败且遇到了系统卡死问题，但她仍奋起直追，最终通关。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.thai: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.ko: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。
desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.jp: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.thai: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.ko: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.zh_tw: 在桃井和綠兩人的幫助下，愛麗絲在三小時內通關了True End。兩人問及愛麗絲對遊戲的評價時，愛麗絲認為遊戲很有意思，聽到此言的柚子終於從櫃子裡出來了。柚子真誠地對愛麗絲道了謝。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
